Reviews.Title: She likes it.
Reviews.Author: H. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife. She likes it. The small size is perfect for her purse. Battery appears to last a long time. The only thing she has said that is not what she expected is the pictures taken at max zoom are not as clear as she thought they should be.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME! THE BEST EVER!!!
Reviews.Author: brandonjackso
Reviews.Content: I absolutly love this camera to death!!! I bought one and never look back at it since then! It's so great! I've had mine for about 5 - 6 years now and it works great still!! Do buy it!!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Box Contents - Coolpix S220, Li-ion rechargeable battery EN-EL10, Battery Charger
10.0 MP (up to 3648 x 2736) CCD for high resolution, detailed images and large prints
3x Optical Zoom (35mm format - 35-105mm) - NIKKOR optics provide exceptional pictures and gets you close to the action.
Incredible, bright 2.5-inch High Resolution LCD makes it easy to compose and share your pictures
4 Way VR Image Stabilization - Nikon's Optical VR Image Stabilization compensates for the effects of camera shake by moving the image sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon CoolPix S220 10MP Silver Digital Camera
